divs: Sighting Detailsthis is the latest ufo ive seen..ive seen a lot of ufos and i know for a fact when i say they was ufos...ive seen 2 ufos up very close and one of those ufos i could have hit with a rock..that one was back in 2000,but its a story that must be told.id rather talk than type about that one...anyway here is the latest ufo i seen...i was walking up my driveway and it was almost 11 AT NIGHT..i got about half way up my driveway and i lit a cigarette..when doing that my head was facing the ground with my hand covering my lighter..also i had a hat on...i lit the cigarette and looked in front of me and i thought..its daylight...then i took two steps and i realized..ITS DAYLIGHT!!!..so i looked at the sky to see why it was daylight at 11 oclock at night and there was the most massive white ufo i had ever seen..at its smallest it was 2 football fields side by side and 2 football fields long..the ufo sat still for just under 20 seconds,then it burst towards scottdale at unbelievable speed..when it first appeared it flashed like lightning..i seen the flash while i was lighting my cigarette,then when it burst away it also flashed like lightning..like i said it was daylight and when it burst away it was brighter than lightning..also when it flew away it was just a streak it went so fast...it didnt make any noise..what was wierd is that you could feel it in a sense...my mother was on here way home when i seen it..she was a little over 1 mile from our house and she said she could see the trees around her lit up like daylight and then she said she seen a very bright flash..she told me that she thought a transformer blew up over top of her car...i gotta go for now..id like to talk if you care to hear about many things ive seen since i started paying attention to the sky..its very important i tell atleast a few of the more amazing ufos i seen due to the detail i can tell you...also i would be glad to take a lie detector test if you have any doubts about what i have said or will say...i gotta go though so good luck with your searches for the facts...bye
Summary: Massive white craft about 2 football fields width and length. I have 2 partial witnesses.
